autoAttack.label: Auto Attack
autoAttack.info: Never blink into trees just to get spotted by your auto-attack again.

autoAttackAfterSpell.label: Auto Attack After Spell
autoAttackAfterSpell.info: Disables auto-attacks after using spells, but also disables auto-attack after auto-attack (will only kill one creep, then stop).

autoSelectSummonedUnits.label: Auto-Select Summoned Units
autoSelectSummonedUnits.info: Adds all newly summoned units to your currently selected group.

unifiedUnitOrders.label: Unified Unit Orders
unifiedUnitOrders.info: Holding CTRL will allow you to issue orders to all controlled units.

autoRepeatRightMouse.label: Auto-Repeat Right Mouse
autoRepeatRightMouse.info: Get those bounty runes, without breaking your mouse.

forceMovementDirection.label: Force Movement Direction
forceMovementDirection.info: Holding ALT when moving will first turn your hero, then move. Useful for playing Shadow Fiend or using Force Staff.

forceRightClickAttack.label: Force Right-Click Attack
forceRightClickAttack.info: Use the right mouse button to deny stuff.

netgraph.label: Show Net Graph
netgraph.info: Shows ping & framerate in the top-right corner.

rangeFinder.label: Show Range Finder
rangeFinder.info: Shows cast ranges for normal- and smartcast.

heroFinder.label: Show Hero Finder
heroFinder.info: When pressing ALT, show a green arrow over your hero.

cameraMoveOnRespawn.label: Move Camera On Respawn
cameraMoveOnRespawn.info: Disables accidental teleporting to your base.

minimapProximityScale.label: Proximity Scale
minimapProximityScale.info: Enables resizing of hero icons, when they're near each other.

minimapProximityScaleDistance.label: Proximity Scale Distance
minimapProximityScaleDistance.info: Specifies how close together the heroes have to be to enable resizing.

minimapProximityScaleMinimum.label: Proximity Scale Minimum
minimapProximityScaleMinimum.info: Hero icon-size, when completely scaled down.

minimapRightClick.label: Right Click
minimapRightClick.info: Disabling this will not allow you to move using the minimap, only useful if you misclick a lot.

gridView.label: Always Show Grid-View
gridView.info: Switch between Grid-View (only icons, but all items) & List-View (only some items, but with names).

muteChat.label: Mute Chat
muteChat.info: Never get flamed again, but never read tips & dank memes either.

screenShake.label: Screen Shake
screenShake.info: Determines how powerful Echo Slams look.

animatePortrait.label: Animate Portrait
animatePortrait.info: The 'portrait' is the image of your hero next to the minimap.

ambientCreatures.label: Ambient Creatures
ambientCreatures.info: Adds some small animals to the Dota 2 world.

worldLighting.label: World Lighting
worldLighting.info: Adds dynamic lights and shadows to the game world.

doubleShadowUpdates.label: Double Shadow Updates
doubleShadowUpdates.info: Deactivating this will cause Dota to refresh shadows only every second frame, which might look worse.

multiCore.label: Use Multi-Core
multiCore.info: Tells the game to use multiple CPUs, should improve performance on nearly every computer.

altTabIdle.label: Alt-Tab Idle
altTabIdle.info: Lowers the framerate, when the game loses focus. Useful to save power.

maximumFramerate.label: Maximum framerate
maximumFramerate.info: Set how many frames per second you want at most. Setting this to 0 will grant maximum frames per second.

clientForcePreload.label: Force Client-Data Preload
clientForcePreload.info: Is said to improve performance for some people.

serverForcePreload.label: Force Server-Data Preload
serverForcePreload.info: Is said to improve performance for some people.

levelOfDetail.label: Level Of Detail
levelOfDetail.info: This value specifies how good far-distant objects are rendered.

shadowQuality.label: Shadow Quality
shadowQuality.info: Higher values mean sharper, more detailed shadows, but impact performance.

gpuLevel.label: GPU Level
gpuLevel.info: Determines how much of your graphics card Dota 2 tries to use.

cpuLevel.label: CPU Level
cpuLevel.info: Determines how much of your processor Dota 2 tries to use.

gpuMemoryLevel.label: GPU Memory Level
gpuMemoryLevel.info: Determines how much of your graphic memory Dota 2 tries to use.

memoryLevel.label: Memory Level
memoryLevel.info: Determines how much of your system memory Dota 2 tries to use.

inputButtonCodeIsScanCode.label: Input Button Code Is Scan Code
inputButtonCodeIsScanCode.info: This setting should allow every keyboard-layout to work with the same key-positions as the default (English-US) keyboard.
